text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the Eastern District of Louisiana ) U.S. Attorney Kenneth A. Polite announced that ALMA DE JESUS MOJICA HERRERA, age 51, and LEONARDO SERRATO POLANIA, age 41, both residents of Bogota, Colombia ,
